00021 #ifndef VECTOR3D_HPP
00022 #define VECTOR3D_HPP
00023 
00024 #include <iostream>  // Debug (C++ syntax) with cout << "DEBUG: " << x << "\n";
00025 using namespace std;
00026 
00030 class Vector3d
00031 {
00032  public:
00033   Vector3d( )
00034     {
00035       //cout << "DEBUG: " << "Vector3d 1" << "\n";
00036       set_x(0);
00037       set_y(0);
00038       set_z(0);
00039     }
00040 
00041   Vector3d( double const x, double const y, double const z )
00042     {
00043       //cout << "DEBUG: " << "Vector3d 2" << "\n";
00044       set_x(x);
00045       set_y(y);
00046       set_z(z);
00047     }
00048 
00049   Vector3d( double const x, double const y )
00050     {
00051       //cout << "DEBUG: " << "Vector3d 3" << "\n";
00052       set_x(x);
00053       set_y(y);
00054       set_z(0);
00055     }
00056 
00057   void set_x(double const x)
00058     {
00059       m_x=x;
00060     }
00061 
00062   void set_y(double const y)
00063     {
00064       m_y=y;
00065     }
00066 
00067   void set_z(float const z)
00068     {
00069       m_z=z;
00070     }
00071 
00072   double get_x() const
00073     {
00074       return m_x;
00075     }
00076 
00077   double get_y() const
00078     {
00079       return m_y;
00080     }
00081 
00082   double get_z() const
00083     {
00084       return m_z;
00085     }
00086 
00087  protected:
00088 
00089  private:
00090   double m_x;
00091   double m_y;
00092   double m_z;
00093 };
